title: Tell me your 3 most played champions and I will tell you your personality and greatest fear.
body:
If this post gets any traction I can't guarantee I'll get to everyone, but I will try to.

EDIT:

TFW u have 350 comments and it took you 2 hours to answer 5 of them

http://grabilla.com/0871c-9af2ef36-9332-4ea9-8880-07366283ad3a.jpg

replies.body:
1 2 3 5 6 7 8 9

did I spook you or what

**Athazagoraphobia - Fear of Being Forgotten or Ignored**

There will be a time when you are thought of for the last time, perhaps by a friend or family member, and then forgotten forever. That is the last, and truest death you will ever face. A point where whatever decisions you made, no matter how grand, will cease to affect anything anymore.

How horrible it is, that so many people are so close to this end even while their bodies are still alive. They walk the streets, invisible. A backdrop. Scenery to the lives of everyone else's life. Their true death comes quickly, as they barely mattered in the first place.

You refuse to resign yourself to such a fate. You must be seen. Your presence must be _felt_ everywhere you go. Every crowd parts ways for you. Every room goes silent when you enter. Whether you are their king or their villain, you must be the most important person in their lives. And maybe, just maybe, you'll be remembered just a little longer.
Riven, Nami, Quinn. In that order.

**Atychiphobia - Fear of Failure**

Your life is finite. Your time is finite. Any moment, any _second_ it could all be over. And that's where you'll be... Lost in the darkness... The end. So you must work. You must improve. Every waking moment is spent chasing the next goal, the next milestone. Nobody's perfect because nobody's ever _tried_ to be. But you... You know the secret. You know every step not taken is another step closer The reaper comes for you. And when he does finally knock on your doorstep, when he is finally ready to remove you from existence, you'll be old, and worn from a life well lived, yet ever so slightly bored and ready to end.

> [{quoted}](name=Birdie Sànders,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=cJHwM5V6,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-07-28T00:57:32.125+0000)
>
> **Atychiphobia - Fear of Failure**
> 
> Your life is finite. Your time is finite. Any moment, any _second_ it could all be over. And that's where you'll be... Lost in the darkness... The end. So you must work. You must improve. Every waking moment is spent chasing the next goal, the next milestone. Nobody's perfect because nobody's ever _tried_ to be. But you... You know the secret. You know every step not taken is another step closer The reaper comes for you. And when he does finally knock on your doorstep, when he is finally ready to remove you from existence, you'll be old, and worn from a life well lived, yet ever so slightly bored and ready to end.

I'm pissed because that's pretty accurate

**Thassophobia - Fear of Boredom**

You're a simple guy/gal, you do what you want, when you want, how you want. 'Cause life is short, you know? The only way to spend it is having the time of your life. So many people are worried about pretty much everything. They worry and worry and worry and then... They're dead. What a shit life that'd be. Sometimes people ask you what the hell you're thinking. That's a really dumb question isn't it? It was fun. And if it wasn't, you won't do it again. Or maybe you will. It might be better next time. Never know until you try.

>Actually, I play a lot of ARAM

A fellow ARAM OTP. Pleased to meet you. <3

>ARAM matches:	
~~8264 Total (28.07.2018)~~ 
8275 Total (29.07.2018)

**Asthenophobia - Fear of Weakness**

Your life is clear and simple. You're **better** than them. All of them. The ones who fear you, follow you, respect you, those are the smart ones. They'll go far in life, under you, of course. 

Most people aren't the smart ones though. Most of them are mindless beasts to brutish to see your potential, to simple-minded to see the inevitability of your greatness. They'll learn, in time. They'll learn while they work 18-hour shifts at 7-11 until they go into the retirement they can't afford, or while they promise themselves that this job at Chuckie-Cheeses is temporary for 30 years. But you'll be kicking up your 4000$ dollar boots, cackling as you call your old pal Zuckerberg for a friendly game of golf over in your resort in Dubai.

But not now though. You're still stuck here, surrounded by idiots who can barely tie their own shoes. Soon it'll be different. Soon.

> [{quoted}](name=ForestFighters14,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=cJHwM5V6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-28T00:41:07.731+0000)
>
> {{champion:45}} {{champion:45}} and {{champion:45}}

 This is my Veigar. There are many like it, but this one is mine. My Veigar champion is my best friend. It is my life, I must master it as I must master my life. My Veigar, without me, is useless. Without my Veigar, I am useless.  I must stun my enemies true. I must ult harder than my enemy who is trying to kill me. I must kill him before he kill me. I will... My Veigar and myself know that what counts in this war is not the Baleful Strikes we fire, the burst of our ult, nor the death we make. We know that it is the stacks that count. We will stack... My Veigar is god, even as I, because it is my life. Thus, I will learn it as a brother. I will learn its weaknesses, its strength, its parts, its accessories, its sights and its Power. I will ever guard it against the ravages of Katarina mains and damage as I will ever guard my title, my hands, my eyes and my heart against damage. I will keep my gameplay clean and ready. We will become part of each other. We will... Before Runeterra, I swear this creed. My Veigar and myself are the defenders of THESE STACKS. We are the masters of our enemies. We are the saviors of my life. So be it, until victory is mine and there is no enemies.

**Inparatophobia - Fear of Being Unprepared**

In life, one fuck up can ruin your entire life. So you've gotta have a fallback. A plan B. You've gotta guarantee that something's gonna work. You know the repercussions of one bad gamble. So skew to odds a little bit. Keep the risks low. If something goes wrong you need to be able to walk out of with both arms. 

You hate fast decision-making. Like you're really gonna bet everything on something as unpredictable as a _reaction_. If you stumble through life making a bunch of ill-informed decisions, you squander your own limitless potential, because you have to waste time cleaning up after every risky plan and bad gamble.

> [{quoted}](name=Birdie Sànders,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=cJHwM5V6,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-07-28T00:39:10.771+0000)
>
> If this post gets any traction I can&#039;t guarantee I&#039;ll get to everyone, but I will try to.

Illaoi riven and cass
Should be FutanaRiven. It still works I guess.

gonna add more to this heaping pile because I can.
{{champion:202}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:238}}
Janna, Zyra, Morgana, in that order. Though honestly, it's tie between Karma and Morgana for third.

Couldn't think of a fear for this one :(


When you were a kid, they tried to teach you about compassion, and sharing, and being nice. Such erroneous bullshit you can't even say them without scoffing. Why should you care about _other people_? They haven't given you jack shit. Your jar of fucks to give about other people is bone fucking dry. And thats how you like it. All the most successful people in the world got that way on trampling on the dreams of their weaker brethren.

You don't have the time to help other people, you can't let yourself be distracted by their abhorrent incompetence. That's how mother nature intended it to be. Those who can't take care of themselves whither and die, unworthy of spreading their pathetic genes unto the next generation. And you fully embrace that fact. This life is about you, it's _your_ life. not Their life. Not everybody's life. Yours.
{{champion:150}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:29}}  From Gnar being my main & Teemo 2nd, Twitch 3rd
